title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Market share, with a total of 10 data points.
Overall Market share has increased over the Year
Market share is roughly constant from 2010 to 2019.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Max Market share about 44.0 was recorded at Year 2019
Min Market share about 36.7 was recorded at Year 2010
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Market share, with a total of 10 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2010 to 2017.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2018 to 2019.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2017 to 2018.
